comment._content: "Shibusawa Eiichi, 1st Viscount Shibusawa (渋沢 栄一, March 16, 1840 – November 11, 1931) was a Japanese industrialist widely known today as the "father of Japanese capitalism". en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shibusawa_Eiichi Similar photo in the New-York tribune., December 01, 1915, Page 1
